entry.tran: 阿月浑子的果实；开心果
entry.def: Pistachios or pistachio nuts are small, green, edible nuts.

means.word_mean: 1. small tree of southern Europe and Asia Minor bearing small hard-shelled nuts
2. nut of Mediterranean trees having an edible green kernel
